Token.Abstract: Model object allows you to story integral data types by key (name) as mutable numbers. Useful to store automatically NSCoding/NSCopying conformant values to any node without having to subclass it.
The model's controller object. You should never change this reference yourself!

ReturnValue.Abstract: The model's controller object. You should never change this reference yourself!

Token.Abstract: The model's controller object. You should never change this reference yourself!

ReturnValue.Abstract: The model's controller object. You should never change this reference yourself!

Token.Abstract: The model's controller object. You should never change this reference yourself!

ReturnValue.Abstract: The model's controller object. You should never change this reference yourself!

Token.Abstract: Set value of the given type for key. Value is mutable, it is not an NSNumber to avoid alloc/dealloc for every set.

Parameter.Name: boolValue
Parameter.Abstract: A boolean.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the variable.

Token.Abstract: Returns the value of the given type for key. Returns NO if there's no value with this key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The BOOL value for the key, or NO if there's no variable with that key.

Token.Abstract: Set value of the given type for key. Value is mutable, it is not an NSNumber to avoid alloc/dealloc for every set.

Parameter.Name: floatValue
Parameter.Abstract: A float.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the variable.

Token.Abstract: Returns the value of the given type for key. Returns 0 if there's no value with this key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The float value for the key, or 0.0f if there's no variable with that key.

Token.Abstract: Set value of the given type for key. Value is mutable, it is not an NSNumber to avoid alloc/dealloc for every set.

Parameter.Name: doubleValue
Parameter.Abstract: A double.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the variable.

Token.Abstract: Returns the value of the given type for key. Returns 0 if there's no value with this key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The double value for the key, or 0.0 if there's no variable with that key.

Token.Abstract: Set value (32-Bit) of the given type for key. Value is mutable, it is not an NSNumber to avoid alloc/dealloc for every set.

Parameter.Name: int32Value
Parameter.Abstract: A 32-bit integer.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the variable.

Token.Abstract: Returns the value (32-Bit) of the given type for key. Returns 0 if there's no value with this key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The int32_t value for the key, or 0 if there's no variable with that key.

Token.Abstract: Set value (32-Bit) of the given type for key. Value is mutable, it is not an NSNumber to avoid alloc/dealloc for every set.

Parameter.Name: unsignedInt32Value
Parameter.Abstract: An unsigned 32-bit integer.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the variable.

Token.Abstract: Returns the value (32-Bit) of the given type for key. Returns 0 if there's no value with this key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The uint32_t value for the key, or 0 if there's no variable with that key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The int64_t value for the key, or 0 if there's no variable with that key.

Token.Abstract: Set value (64-Bit) of the given type for key. Value is mutable, it is not an NSNumber to avoid alloc/dealloc for every set.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the variable.

Parameter.Abstract: A unique string identifying the variable.

Token.Abstract: Assign or replace any object with the given key. If object is nil, the object for that key will be removed.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The object to store in the dictionary.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A unique string to identify the object.

Token.Abstract: The object for key or nil if there's no object associated with this key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The object for key or nil if there's no object associated with this key.

Token.Abstract: Accessing the KKMutableNumber object directly allows you to change the value without having to reassign it using a setter method.

Parameter.Name: A
Parameter.Abstract: unique string identifying the variable.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The underlying KKMutableNumber object for a specific variable.A mutable number object or nil if no variable with the given key was found.
